oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Gold locket with photograph of a Confederate soldier
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The soldier in this small, gold locket is unidentified. He appears in a gray coat with black frogging around a center row of buttons. The collar is also trimmed in a dark color. Donor indicates that this family was either from Alabama or Mississippi. The soldier may have the last name of Knight, Hemmonds, or Pitts.
